content:
Vocational Qualification - TUM - TUM School of Computation, Information and Technology

Former preparatory course for students with vocational qualifications
Former preparatory course for students with vocational qualifications
Even if you do not have a higher education entrance qualification, you can take up a Bachelor's degree program at TUM under certain conditions. For all information on this, please refer to
- Application for Master Craftspersons and Qualified Professionals
Until 2024, the mandatory admission exam on mathematics was conducted by the TUM School of Computation, Information and Technology and this page contained further information on this exam.
From 2025, the eligibility assessment is re-organized. Please refer to the above link for all information on admissions without higher education entrance qualification. All related questions should be directed to the contact points indicated there and not to the TUM School of Computation, Information and Technology.
Former preparatory course for students with vocational qualifications
